List of recent commits added to DerpFest
Configure the LED light for supported options
However, new features may be added here soon. Check back after future updates!
A little info about the team
Tap here to open our wonderful community!
Tap here to open our Github!

This is a small project based on AOSP. We try to be a platform for beginners and support the Custom ROM community with our own unique contributions as well. This ROM exists thanks to inspiration of AOSiP, Thank you!
For all changes to take effect, a SystemUI restart is required. Restart SystemUI now?
